attributes.action: To make the taxi trade one tier system nationwide and cap the numbers
attributes.additional_details: The likes of aps that are now use in the cab trade have become a big problem in the trade ie the companys like uber and buget and other companys that have no cab office were people can go into to get a cab there just a faceless company that takes calls and are mostley not it the town or city where people want cabs
attributes.background: As more and more people are just coming to the cab trade it is now flooded with private hire cars which are parking all over the towns and citys causing more traffic conjestion

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
